channel.title: [PI] Color items? o.o
channel.description:
Uhm, i am using Hybrid PvP base and it comes with colored whips ( the ones u get from barb. assault in real RS ) and i have the code but i am wondering how could i change the color of one of the whips? from like... green to Bright yellow?
thank you for the help, Moparscape

item.title: [PI] Color items? o.o
item.dc:creator: @tehsandbox tehsandbox
item.description:
@tehsandbox wrote:

you have to get the models and ints for a new wep. and add them to your client
